message: One misstep is all it takes. The potions flicker out of order, their glow faltering before dissolving into nothingness. The sequence is broken. With it, your hope fades. You have been defeated.

A single moment of distraction, and chaos takes its form. The potions misalign, their lights flickering before they vanish into shadows. The sequence is shattered. The challenge is lost. You are defeated.

One mistake, one fraction of a second, and everything you built crumbles into the void. The potions flicker out of sync, their glow dimming and fading. The sequence has collapsed. Your defeat is inevitable.
The final misstep. A single miscalculation and the magic dissolves. The potions dim, their light flickering before disappearing into nothing. The sequence has failed. You have fallen.
A slip of the mind, and everything unravels. The potions flicker and fade, their glow extinguishing into the abyss. The sequence is broken. The challenge is lost. You are defeated.
One misstep, and the power dissipates. The potions misalign, their light faltering before vanishing into darkness. The sequence has shattered. No more moves. Only defeat.
A single mistake, and the foundation crumbles. The potions flicker, their light weak before they fade into the nothingness. The sequence has fallen apart. You have lost.
The smallest of errors, and everything you fought for collapses. The potions flicker, their glow dying before they dissolve into the void. The sequence is broken. The end has come. You are defeated.
